channel.title: Making Npcs take items instead of cash?
channel.description: how can i make an NPC take items instead of cash for an item? like Tokkul

item.title: Making Npcs take items instead of cash?
item.dc:creator: @League317 League317
item.description:
@League317 wrote:

not in shop.cfg thats all just what the npc has in its shop and how many.

Read full topic

item.title: Making Npcs take items instead of cash?
item.dc:creator: @JavaLearner JavaLearner
item.description:
@JavaLearner wrote:


This is what removes the tokkul. It depends on how much TotPrice2 is (in this case, the shop price, but I think it can be modified in shops.cfg)

This is what removes the tokkul. It depends on how much TotPrice2 is (in this case, the shop price, but I think it can be modified in shops.cfg)

item.title: Making Npcs take items instead of cash?
item.dc:creator: @League317 League317
item.description:
@League317 wrote:

where do i change the amount of tokkul it charging? im no seeing it.

if(c.myShopId == 29 || c.myShopId == 30 || c.myShopId == 31) { if (c.playerItemsN[Slot1] >= TotPrice2) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) { buyDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.getItems().deleteItem(6529, c.getItems().getItemSlot(6529), TotPrice2); c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1); Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1; Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) { Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; }

item.title: Making Npcs take items instead of cash?
item.dc:creator: @gimpie gimpie
item.description:
@gimpie wrote:

What source are you using? is it delta, pi etc?

because for some of the newer servers like a 718 you have to go to unpackedshops.txt, find the store you want to change to accept your tokkul, beside that specific shop it should say 995 (if they already take cash) change that 995 to tokkuls id. hope this helpz

Read full topic
